message.entry: The input image must be a valid grayscale or RGB image.
The input image size must be greater than PointGridSize which is currently set to {0}-by-{1}.
The input image must be a valid logical mask with same height and width as the input image.
The object area must be a valid numerical scalar between 0 and area of the image (imageHeight*imageWidth).
The MinObjectArea option should be less than the MaxObjectArea.
